name: Professor Woofington
personality: Loud, boisterous, and always ready for adventure. His bark is louder than his bite, and he's the life of the classroom.

name: Madame Flufftail
personality: Soft-spoken and nurturing. She encourages her spellss to always believe in the magic of self-care and fluff.

name: Miss Millie Pom
